question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. coffee cup
B. PANDEMIC book
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The PANDEMIC book is on the table closer to the foreground, while the coffee cup is slightly behind it on the same table, making the coffee cup clearly further away from the camera.
